question: Q37 What is the difference between an assembly and a namespace?
options: Assemblies organize code, namespaces compile code
Namespaces organize code, assemblies contain compiled code
Namespaces compile code, assemblies execute code
Assemblies store runtime data, namespaces create libraries
answer: B Namespaces organize code, assemblies contain compiled code
correct_answer: Namespaces organize code, assemblies contain compiled code
